article_title: Surprise Bills for Many Under Health Law
article_text:
1:22

Voices on Obama's Hiroshima Visit

Barack Obama is set to go to Hiroshima, the first sitting U.S. president to visit the site where the U.S. dropped an atomic bomb at the end of World War II. Here are some voices on the historic visit. Photo: Getty

article_metadata.description: Consumers with health coverage through the Affordable Care Act are facing surprise medical bills that sometimes exceed the caps on out of pocket expenses. WSJ’s Stephanie Armour reports. Photo: Getty
